_header: O man which art the earth take fro
_description: James Ryman, a reminder of mortality — six quatrains (aaab) with refrain, ’Amittes mundi prospera’ and burden: ‘Hec sunt verba prophetica / Amittes mundi prospera’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O man whiche art the erthe take frooAyene into erthe thou shalt
                    goo…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Where is no nyght but euer dayEt infinita
                    prospera

Zupitza,  Julius,
